loc_tavern.name: The Rusty Tankard
loc_tavern.description: A dim, smoky tavern smelling of stale ale and sawdust. Locals whisper in hushed tones.

generated_loc_the_outside.name: The Moonlit Square
generated_loc_the_outside.description: Stepping out from the warm, boisterous tavern, you find yourself bathed in the ethereal glow of the twin moons. The square, paved with ancient, uneven cobblestones, stretches before you. Flickering lanterns hang from the eaves of tall, timber-framed buildings, casting dancing shadows. The air is cool and carries the distant sounds of night life – a bard's lute, a merchant's distant shout, and the rustle of wind through unseen trees.

story_state.current_objective: Investigate the inhabitants of The Moonlit Square.
story_state.narrative_direction: Observational, investigative, with a touch of mystery regarding the square's true nature.
